original_title: ‘Dawson’s Creek’ reunion: James Van Der Beek, Katie Holmes and cast to participate in charity script reading | CNN
article_summary: "Dawson's Creek" cast reunites for a live script reading on Broadway in September, supporting F Cancer and James Van Der Beek. The event, titled "Dawson's Creek Class Reunion," will feature the original cast members including James Van Der Beek, Katie Holmes, Michelle Williams, and Joshua Jackson, along with additional cast members. Van Der Beek, who recently revealed his battle with stage 3 colorectal cancer, shared the news on Instagram.</s>
